gold: Hogs and pigs are one of the main sources of meat in the United States , and there is a thriving domestic pork market.
As of March 2019 , Iowa had an inventory of about 23.5 million hogs and pigs , making it the top producer of swine in the country by a large margin.
In that same year , the second largest producer of hogs and pigs was North Carolina , with about 8.9 million head .
